sentences.en: Can you get a bellboy to retrieve my bags from my room?
sentences.cn: 能不能请你派一位行李员到我房间取行李?

sentences.en: Computers can instantly retrieve millions of information bits.
sentences.cn: 计算机可以立即检索到数百万条信息。

sentences.en: Did he retrieve the missing file on Operation Nightfall?
sentences.cn: 他是否找到失踪的奈特费操作的档案?

sentences.en: He did his best to retrieve the situation, amidst some laughter.
sentences.cn: 他在哄笑中尽力挽回尴尬的局面.

sentences.en: He is the one man who could retrieve that situation.
sentences.cn: 他是唯一能挽回局面的人。

sentences.en: He was determined to retrieve his honor.
I ran back to retrieve the bag I had left in the train.
sentences.cn: 我跑回去找回忘在火车上的包.

sentences.en: People stared at him as he walked through the park to retrieve his bicycle.
sentences.cn: 他回到公园取自行车的时候,人们都看着他.

sentences.en: She bent down to retrieve her earring.
She bent to retrieve her comb from the floor.
sentences.cn: 她弯腰从地上捡起她的梳子。

sentences.en: Spending one dollar to retrieve thirty was absolutely worthwhile.
sentences.cn: 破费一块来钱而能要回那一笔款,是上算的事.

sentences.en: The basis for training relies on the dog's natural instinct to hunt and retrieve.
sentences.cn: 训练是基于狗搜寻和衔回的天生本能。

sentences.en: The fielders try to retrieve the ball quickly and return it to the bowler.
sentences.cn: 外野手试图迅速接过球传给投球手.

sentences.en: The general made one last desperate effort to retrieve the situation.
sentences.cn: 将军为挽回局面而孤注一掷。

sentences.en: The men were trying to retrieve weapons left when the army abandoned the island.
sentences.cn: 士兵们正试图找回军队从该岛撤退时留下的武器。

sentences.en: The new version of the software automatically retrieves digital information.
sentences.cn: 新版软件会自动检索数字信息。

sentences.en: There was absolutely no way that we were going to be able to retrieve it.
sentences.cn: 我们绝对不可能把它找回来。

sentences.en: They decided that it was essential to retrieve the papers from the smoldering building.
sentences.cn: 他们决定,务必把文件从还在冒烟的大楼中抢救出来.

words.tran_cn: 可取回的；可补偿的；可检索的
（训练成能寻回猎物的）猎犬；取回的人

trans.tran_en: to get back information that has been stored in the memory of a computer
to find something and bring it back

trans.tran_cn: 取回，恢复，[计]检索，重新得到
trans.tran_en: to find something and bring it back
to make a situation satisfactory again after there has been a serious mistake or problem
